name: I don't endorse Google
author: Andrea Pernici

sections.description:
Automatically add a rel=”nofollow” to all links going to Google’s page inside your wordpress posts.

More info:

  • More info on I don’t endorse Google, with info on how to configure it.
  • Check out the other WordPress plugins by the same author, and follow him on the: SEO Blog.

Changelog

1.0.3

  • Compatibility check

1.0.2

  • Compatibility

1.0.1

  • Added Youtube, Blogspot and all the properties here http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Google_domains
  • Fixed http://google.*

1.0.0

  • Release
sections.installation:
Download, Upgrading, Installation:

Upgrade

  1. First deactivate I dont’t endorse Google
  2. Remove the nofollow-google directory

Install

  1. Unzip the nofollow-google.zip file.
  2. Upload the the nofollow-google folder (not just the files in it!) to your wp-contents/plugins folder. If you’re using FTP, use ‘binary’ mode.

Activate

  1. In your WordPress administration, go to the Plugins page
  2. Activate the “I don’t endorse Google” and you’re fine.

If you find any bugs or have any ideas, please mail me.
sections.faq: Please before asking question read post and comments here https://www.andreapernici.com/wordpress/nofollow-google/
